title: The dynamics of TCAM integration in the Indian public health
author: Patel; Gupteswar; Brosnan; Caragh; Taylor; Ann; Garimella; Surekha
description: Hierarchies of power among healthcare professionals are well documented, nonetheless, power remains neglected, understudied and under-theorised in health systems analysis and policy discussions, espec
